H0.text: What successful racehorse trainer died on 1 June 2009. Henry Cecil

H1.text: What successful racehorse trainer died on 1 June 2009. Dick Whittington

H2.text: What successful racehorse trainer died on 1 June 2009. John Hawkes

H3.text: What successful racehorse trainer died on 1 June 2009. Vincent O'Brien

A4.text: He died of cancer on 11 June 2013 in hospital in Cambridge.

A5.text: Cecil died of cancer on 11 June 2013.
